original_text: Therefore that place was called Beersheba, because there both of them swore an oath.
korean_text: 두 사람이 거기서 서로 맹세하였으므로 그 곳을 브엘세바라 이름하였더라

sentences.original_text: Therefore that place was called Beersheba
because there both of them swore an oath.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그곳에서 그 두 사람이 맹세하였기 때문이다
